summary: Eli Lilly reported Q4 2025 global Zepbound revenue of $4,261 million on Feb 4, 2026
content: From the Q4 2025 earnings press release (Feb 4, 2026): Zepbound Q4 2025 global revenue was $4,261 million, up 123% from Q4 2024's $1,907 million. Full year 2025 was $13,542 million. Source: investor.lilly.com press release.
